translation: Filled with insatiable desires, full of hypocrisy, pride, and arrogance, holding evil ideas due to delusion, they work with impure intentions.
commentary: 16.10 desire desire? dependence abiding in? Dushpuram insatiable? arrogant and drunk full of hypocrisy? pride and,arrogance? Mohat through delusion? taking having held? Asadgrahan evil ideas? pravartante they work? impure vows with impure resolves.Commentary These soulless malevolent persons perform cruel and sinful actions. Are their minds saturated with vanity? conceit and arrogance. They entertain
